attributes.additional_details: Daft Punk are legends and they can’t split up!!
attributes.background: Bring back Daft Punk and we want a new album for the pain they’ve put us through, and collabs with The Weeknd and Julian Casablancas!!

rejection.details:
Any decision to re-form Daft Punk, and any potential collaborations, is a matter for them, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may Get Lucky and find they choose to reform One More Time.
